displayName.english: THE FIRST NOTE OF A GHOSTSEEKER

description.english: Discover the first note about the "House"
Uncover the inaugural note regarding the "Fearstalkers"
Unveil the primary note concerning the "Watcher".
Unearth the initial note pertaining to "Fear"
Complete the prologue of the Ghostseeker, a streamer exploring a haunted house.
Leap into the unknown through the doorway to find only a tunnel or hole, and take the plunge from a great height.
Witness the horrifying transformation of the once-innocent house into a grotesque, living organic nightmare, oozing with biomass, blood, and dread.
Complete the game to unlock Last Hope mode
